name: Forest of Memories
description:
An interactive journal experience. 

  • Add memories to create a forest around you. 
  • Revisit your memories by interacting with trees.
  • See the overall sentiment* of your entries
  • Visit forests created from classic literature

Created over the course of two and a half weeks as my capstone project for Ada Developer's Academy.

* This game interacts with IBM Watson's Tone Analyzer API to analyze your text and determine what tree to create. The IBM Watson™ Tone Analyzer service processes but does not store users' data. Game data is only saved locally on your machine.
